txt.en: Kindred with the Townsfolk of the Kingstead Neighbourhoods
The Townsfolk of the Kingstead Neighbourhoods consider you to be one of the post important members of the community. You are a kindred soul and an upstanding citizen.
You must earn Kindred standing with the Townsfolk of the Kingstead Neighbourhoods
All you have done for your neighbours has earned their respect in such a way that you have become friends for life.
